title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus as expected.
OB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked.
EB: The first Combo is not taking focus when clicked.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. 
2. Press the 'Tab' key and notice the focus goes to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
